title: Ticket #2492: Add support for condor_status -direct to SCHEDD
description:
the new SCHEDD Statistics added in #2197 would be more useful if the SCHEDD supported the condor_status -direct. Add command handlers for querying the Scheduler and Submitter ads to the SCHEDD.

Also add a hidden option to condor_status that works along with -direct to allow the statistics verbosity level to be controlled. for example 

   condor_status -direct <machine> -schedd -statistics "DC:1, Scheduler:2"

would return Scheduler Ads with Daemon Core level 1 and Scheduler level 2 statistics attributes
